overview: Heaven makes mistakes too. Juan dela Cruz (Janno Gibbs) was killed before his time and must be sent back to earth. However, the chief angel with a human name Angelo (Tony Mabesa) found out that he was due to die in one week's time or next Saturday or Sabado in Filipino and he would go to hell.
tagline: An angel falls in love with a human.
title: I Love You Sabado!!!
